amfiora.desc1: Shampoo “Black cumin” not only delicately cleanses the hair and scalp, but also has active caring properties. Hair after shampooing becomes denser and more voluminous. Black cumin seed oil deeply nourishes and regenerates hair, leaving it with a rich shine. Suitable for all hair types.
amfiora.desc2: Caring Face Mask “Black cumin” intensively nourishes and restores damaged areas of the facial skin thanks to bioactive substances and amino acids, as well as vitamins A, B, D and E. The cream restores healthy appearance and elasticity to the skin.
amfiora.desc3: Facial scrub with black seed oil is a new and innovative peeling technology. The product has a deep healing property of cleansing, restoring, renewing and rejuvenating the skin of the face. The scrub perfectly removes unwanted age spots and other defects of the skin surface.
amfiora.desc4: Depilatory cream with black seed oil is designed to gently and effectively remove unwanted hair on the legs, arms, bikini area and armpits. Thanks to its bioactive ingredients, the cream gently moisturizes and protects the skin during and after the depilation process, makes the skin smooth and soft.
amfiora.desc5: The face cream effectively rejuvenates and regenerates the skin, stimulates cell regeneration. Delicate texture for the care of all skin types due to the natural bioactive components of black seed oil, the environment. Recommended for the whole family.
amfiora.desc6: Hand cream with black cumin oil, thanks to natural bioactive components and microelements, perfectly nourishes and restores the skin’s hydrobalance. It activates the processes of skin regeneration and protects against negative environmental factors.Recommended for the whole family.
amfiora.desc7: Foot cream with black seed oil has excellent antioxidant properties. Thanks to its active natural ingredients, it nourishes the skin and has a positive effect on the regenerative properties of cells. Recommended for the whole family.
amfiora.desc8: Unique hair balm “Black cumin” for intensive care of dull and damaged hair. Black cumin seed oil deeply nourishes the roots and improves the condition of weakened hair, restores its elasticity and shine, makes the strands thicker and more elastic.

barg.desc1: «BARG» idishlarni yuvish vositasining 1-2 tomchisidan ko‘p miqdorda yumshoq ko‘pik olish imkonini beradi. Mahsulot yog‘ni va har qanday kirni sovuq suvda ham mukammal darajada tozalaydi, shuningdek, suv bilan osongina yuviladi, idish-tovoq va qo‘l terisida dog‘ qoldirmaydi. Glitserin tufayli mahsulot qo‘llar terisini yumshatadi, qichitmaydi.
barg.desc2: «BARG» idishlarni yuvish vositasining 1-2 tomchisidan ko‘p miqdorda yumshoq ko‘pik olish imkonini beradi. Mahsulot yog‘ni va har qanday kirni sovuq suvda ham mukammal darajada tozalaydi, shuningdek, suv bilan osongina yuviladi, idish-tovoq va qo‘l terisida dog‘ qoldirmaydi. Glitserin tufayli mahsulot qo‘llar terisini yumshatadi, qichitmaydi.

effetta.desc1: Bodring ekstraktli yuz losyoni yuz terisini muloyimlik bilan oqartiradi, tozalaydi, yumshatadi va tetiklantiradi. Bodring ekstrakti-ning faol moddalari terini yoshartiradi va teridagi teshikchalarni toraytirib, zarur namlik darajasini ta’minlaydi. Tarkibida C vitamini  bo’lgani uchun terini oqartiradi, pigment dog’lari paydo bo’lishining oldini oladi.
effetta.desc2: Bodring ekstraktli shampun yog’lanishga moyil sochlarni intensiv tozalaydi va namlaydi. Bodring ekstrakti C va B guruhi vitaminlariga boy, ular sochlarni mukammal oziqlantiradi, tiklaydi va uzoq vaqt musaffolik hissini beradi. Qo’llanilishi: shampunni nam sochlarga yengil uqalab surting, iliq suv bilan yuvib tashlang.
effetta.title3: Yuz yuvish uchun ko’pik Effetta «Cucumber fresh»
effetta.desc3: Yuzni tozalash uchun maxsus yaratilgan YUZ YUVISH UCHUN KO’PIK mahsuloti terini chuqur qatlamlaridagi kosmetikani muloyimlik bilan bartaraf qiladi. Bodring ekstraktining foydali tarkibiy qismlari oziqlantiruvchi, tetiklantiruvchi va namlantiruvchi vosita vazifasini bajaradi. Ko’pik terining elastikligini tiklaydi va tashqi salbiy ta’sirlardan himoya qiladi. Yoqimli hid, havodor tuzilishga ega.
effetta.desc4: Barcha turdagi sochlar uchun mo’ljallangan bodring ekstraktli chayuvchi-balzami yog’lanishga moyil bo’lgan sochlarni intensiv parvarishlaydi. Balzam formulasi bodring ekstraktida mavjud bo’lgan C va B guruhi vitaminlari bilan boyitilgan. Balzam tufayli sochlaringizni tarash oson bo’ladi va ularning elastikligi oshadi. Balzamni qo’llaganingizdan keyin sochlar yanada zich va yorqin bo’ladi.
effetta.desc5: Bodring ekstrakti bilan oqartiruvchi yuz niqobi teringizga muloyimlik bilan g’amxo’rlik qiladi, uni tozalaydi, yumshatadi va tetiklantiradi. Allantoin va aloe vera ekstrakti teri hujayralarini yangilaydi va uni tarang va elastik qiladi, tezkor lifting ta’sir ko’rsatadi, terini yoshartiradi va tetiklantiradi, sog’lom yuz rangini hadiya etadi.

exxper.desc1: Éclair dan erkaklar uchun maxsus Exxper  shampuni – bu intensiv parvarish va sochlarni yog’ va kirlanishlardan muloyimlik bilan tozalaydi, qazg’oq hosil bo’lishiga qarshi kurashadi va muzlatish effektiga ega, shuningdek mentol tufayli uzoq vaqt musaffolik hissini uyg’unlashtiradi. Sochlarga yumshoqlik va tabiiy jilo baxsh etadi. Kundalik foydalanish uchun mos keladi.
exxper.desc2: Éclair dan ekstra tetiklantiruvchi Exxper dush uchun geli maxsus erkaklar terisi uchun yaratilgan. Gel tarkibidagi faol moddalar terini mukammal darajada tozalaydi, mentol esa okean salqinligi va uzoq vaqt tetiklantirish tuyg’usini hadya etadi. Neytral formulalar, terini quritmaydi. Vosita yaxshi ko’piradi va oson yuviladi.
exxper.desc3: Éclair dan sochlar uchun maxsus oziqlantiruvchi Exxper balzam-chayuvchi (konditsioneri) vositasi erkaklar sochlarini intensiv parvarish qilishga mo’ljallangan. Keratin va Pantenol sochlarning ildizlarini chuqur oziqlantiradi va ularning holatini yaxshilab, tarangligi va yorqinligini tiklaydi, soch tutamlarini qalin va elastik qiladi.
exxper.title4: Soqol olishdan keyin foydalanadigan balzam Exxper
exxper.desc4: Éclair dan ta’sirchan terilar uchun maxsus ishlab chiqilgan Exxper balzami soqol olishdan keyin foydalanadigan vosita bo’lib, terini intensiv namlaydi, oziqlantiradi, tinchlantiradi va tetiklashtiradi. D-Pantenol va allantoin yuz terisini ehtiyotkorlik bilan parvarishlaydi, qichishishni yo’qotadi va terini silliq qiladi.

brands.title: Brendlar
brands.desc: Bu yerda 'Farhod va Faxriddinjon' dilerlik firmasining eclair kompaniyasining mahsulotlarining brendlarini ko'rishingiz mumkin.
